leadingOnBoardUnitId.description: see NID_ENGINE. To be usable with ETCS must contain a decimal number [0..16.777.215]

issuedAt.description: issue-point in time with microsecond-precision builds a version-id for acknowledgements and validity-estimations, in UTC

nidSP.description: defines national identifier for the segment profile

version.description: defines the version of the segment profile

nidC.description: defines country identifier for the segment profile

pos.description: position on the associated on the segment profile

x.description: x/latitude coordinate value as per ETRS89

y.description: y/longitude coordinate value as per ETRS89

z.description: z/altitude coordinate value as per ETRS89

description: Defines structure of Map Area Request

mapAreaRadius.description: defines the radius value covering the requested map area

relativePosition.description: defines relative position of the train

absolutePosition.description: defines absolute position of the train
